org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web
Class AeAbstractListingBean

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.AeAbstractAdminBean
      org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.AeAbstractListingBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeErrorAwareBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeAlarmListingBean, AeCatalogListingBean, AeMessageReceiversListingBean, AeProcessListingBean
public abstract class AeAbstractListingBean
extends AeAbstractAdminBean

Provides common methods for displaying "scrollable" rows on web page.

Field Summary

          Indicates if there are more rows to view.

          Number of rows that actually displayed.
protected  int mRowStart

protected  int mTotalRows
          Total number of rows available (not necessarily on this page though).
